subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick looked a lot like the old Andy Roddick in a 6-4, 6-4 loss to Tommy Haas in the second round of the Pacific Life Open, his earliest exit here in six years.
snippet: Andy Roddick looked a lot like the old Andy Roddick in a 6-4, 6-4 loss to Tommy Haas in the second round of the Pacific Life Open, his earliest exit here in six years.
